summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to Jay Lefkowitz regarding Jeffrey Epstein's plea agreement and sentencing. It confirms that the plea and sentence will occur on the same day, on or before January 4, 2008, based on information from Jack Goldberger.

keyFacts: An email dated October 31, 2007, discusses the scheduling of Jeffrey Epstein's plea and sentencing.
The plea and sentence were planned to occur on the same day, on or before January 4, 2008.
The information about this legal schedule was conveyed as conforming to the understanding of Jack Goldberger.
